trans-unit.source: .NET Core CLI test communication protocol
trans-unit.target: .NET Core CLI 测试通信协议

trans-unit.source: .NET, .NET Core
trans-unit.target: .NET, .NET Core

trans-unit.source: .NET Core CLI test communication protocol
trans-unit.target: .NET Core CLI 测试通信协议

trans-unit.source: This topic applies to .NET Core Tools Preview 2.
trans-unit.target: 本主题适用于 .NET Core 工具预览版 2。

trans-unit.source: For the .NET Core Tools RC4 documentation, see the [.NET Core command-line interface tools (.NET Core Tools RC4)](../preview3/tools/index.md) section.
trans-unit.target: 有关 .NET Core 工具 RC4 文档，请参阅 [.NET Core 命令行接口工具（.NET Core 工具 RC4）](../preview3/tools/index.md)部分。

trans-unit.source: Introduction
trans-unit.target: 介绍

trans-unit.source: Anytime you pass a port to dotnet test, the command will run in design time.
trans-unit.target: 每次将端口传递给 dotnet 测试时，命令将在设计时运行。

trans-unit.source: That means that `dotnet test` will connect to that port using TCP and will then exchange an established set of messages with whatever else is connected to that port.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着 `dotnet test` 将使用 TCP 连接到该端口，然后与连接到此端口的其他任何内容交换一组已确定的消息。

trans-unit.source: When this happens, the runner also receives a new port that `dotnet test` will use to communicate with it.
trans-unit.target: 发生这种情况时，运行程序还会收到 `dotnet test` 将用于与其通信的新端口。

trans-unit.source: The reason why the runner also uses TCP to communicate with `dotnet test` is because in design mode, it is not sufficient to just output results to the console.
trans-unit.target: 运行程序也使用 TCP 与 `dotnet test` 通信的原因是因为，在设计模式中，仅将结果输出到控制台是不够的。

trans-unit.source: The command needs to send the adapter structure messages containing the results of the test execution.
trans-unit.target: 命令需要发送包含测试执行结果的适配器结构消息。

trans-unit.source: Communication protocol at design time.
trans-unit.target: 设计时的通信协议。

trans-unit.source: Because during design time, `dotnet test` connects to a port when it starts up, the adapter needs to be listening on that port otherwise `dotnet test` will fail.
trans-unit.target: 由于在设计时期间，`dotnet test` 在启动时会连接到某个端口，因此适配器需要侦听此端口，否则 `dotnet test` 将失败。

trans-unit.source: We did it like this so that the adapter could reserve all the ports it needs by binding and listening to them before `dotnet test` ran and tried to get ports for the runner.
trans-unit.target: 这样一来，适配器可通过在 `dotnet test` 运行和尝试获取运行程序的端口前绑定和侦听这些端口，保留它所需的所有端口。

trans-unit.source: Once `dotnet test` starts, it sends a TestSession.Connected message to the adapter indicating that it is ready to receive messages.
trans-unit.target: `dotnet test` 启动后，将向适配器发送 TestSession.Connected 消息，指示它已准备好接收消息。

trans-unit.source: It is possible to send an optional [version check](https://github.com/dotnet/cli/blob/rel/1.0.0-preview2/src/Microsoft.Extensions.Testing.Abstractions/Messages/ProtocolVersionMessage.cs) message with the adapter version of the protocol in it.
trans-unit.target: 可以在发送可选[版本检查](https://github.com/dotnet/cli/blob/rel/1.0.0-preview2/src/Microsoft.Extensions.Testing.Abstractions/Messages/ProtocolVersionMessage.cs)消息时，随附协议的适配器版本。

trans-unit.source: `dotnet test` will send back the version of the protocol that it supports.
trans-unit.target: `dotnet test` 将发送回其支持的协议版本。

trans-unit.source: All messages have the format described here: [Message.cs](https://github.com/dotnet/cli/blob/rel/1.0.0-preview2/src/Microsoft.Extensions.Testing.Abstractions/Messages/Message.cs).
trans-unit.target: 所有消息都采用此处所述的格式：[Message.cs](https://github.com/dotnet/cli/blob/rel/1.0.0-preview2/src/Microsoft.Extensions.Testing.Abstractions/Messages/Message.cs)。

trans-unit.source: The payload formats for each message is described in links to the classes used to serialize/deserialize the information in the description of the protocol.
trans-unit.target: 每条消息的有效负载格式在指向用于序列化/反序列化协议描述中信息的类的链接中有所介绍。

trans-unit.source: Test Execution
trans-unit.target: 测试执行

trans-unit.source: Test Execution
trans-unit.target: 测试执行

trans-unit.source: After the optional version check, the adapter sends a TestExecution.GetTestRunnerProcessStartInfo, with the [tests](https://github.com/dotnet/cli/blob/rel/1.0.0-preview2/src/Microsoft.Extensions.Testing.Abstractions/Messages/RunTestsMessage.cs) it wants to execute inside of it.
trans-unit.target: 可选版本检查后，适配器会发送 TestExecution.GetTestRunnerProcessStartInfo，内含适配器希望在其中执行的[测试](https://github.com/dotnet/cli/blob/rel/1.0.0-preview2/src/Microsoft.Extensions.Testing.Abstractions/Messages/RunTestsMessage.cs)。

trans-unit.source: `dotnet test` sends back a FileName and Arguments inside a [TestStartInfo](https://github.com/dotnet/cli/blob/rel/1.0.0-preview2/src/dotnet/commands/dotnet-test/TestStartInfo.cs) payload that the adapter can use to start the runner.
trans-unit.target: `dotnet test` 会在适配器可用于启动运行程序的 [TestStartInfo](https://github.com/dotnet/cli/blob/rel/1.0.0-preview2/src/dotnet/commands/dotnet-test/TestStartInfo.cs) 有效负载内发送回文件名和参数。

trans-unit.source: In the past, we would send the list of tests to run as part of that argument, but we were actually going over the command line size limit for some test projects.
trans-unit.target: 过去，我们会发送测试列表作为参数的一部分进行运行，但对某些测试项目来说，我们实际上要超过了命令行大小限制。

trans-unit.source: As part of the arguments, we send a port that the runner should connect to and for executing tests, a --wait-command flag, that indicates that the runner should connect to the port and wait for commands, instead of going ahead and executing the tests.
trans-unit.target: 作为参数的一部分，我们会发送运行程序应连接的端口，而对于执行测试，会发送一个 --wait-command 标志，指示运行程序应连接到端口并等待命令，而不是继续执行测试。

trans-unit.source: At this point, the adapter can launch the runner (and attach to it for debugging if it chooses to).
trans-unit.target: 此时，适配器可以启动运行程序（并附加到运行程序进行调试，如果选择这样做的话）。

trans-unit.source: Once the runner starts, it sends `dotnet test` a TestRunner.WaitCommand message that indicates it is ready to receive commands, at which point `dotnet test` sends a TestRunner.Execute with the list of [tests](https://github.com/dotnet/cli/blob/rel/1.0.0-preview2/src/Microsoft.Extensions.Testing.Abstractions/Messages/RunTestsMessage.cs) to run.
trans-unit.target: 运行程序启动后，会向 `dotnet test` 发送 TestRunner.WaitCommand 消息，指示它已准备好接收命令，此时 `dotnet test` 会发送 TestRunner.Execute，随附要运行的[测试](https://github.com/dotnet/cli/blob/rel/1.0.0-preview2/src/Microsoft.Extensions.Testing.Abstractions/Messages/RunTestsMessage.cs)列表。

trans-unit.source: This bypasses the command line size limit described above.
trans-unit.target: 这将绕过上述的命令行大小限制。

trans-unit.source: The runner then sends `dotnet test` (and it passes forward to the adapter) a TestExecution.TestStarted for each tests as they start with the [test](https://github.com/dotnet/cli/blob/rel/1.0.0-preview2/src/Microsoft.Extensions.Testing.Abstractions/Test.cs) information inside of it.
trans-unit.target: 启动时，运行程序会向 `dotnet test` 发送用于每个测试的 TestExecution.TestStarted（dotnet test 再传递到适配器），其中随附[测试](https://github.com/dotnet/cli/blob/rel/1.0.0-preview2/src/Microsoft.Extensions.Testing.Abstractions/Test.cs)信息。

trans-unit.source: The runner also sends `dotnet test` (and it forwards to the adapter) a TestExecution.TestResult for each test with the [individual result](https://github.com/dotnet/cli/blob/rel/1.0.0-preview2/src/Microsoft.Extensions.Testing.Abstractions/TestResult.cs) of the test.
trans-unit.target: 运行程序也会向 `dotnet test` 发送用于每个测试的 TestExecution.TestResult（dotnet test 再转发到适配器），随附测试的[各个结果](https://github.com/dotnet/cli/blob/rel/1.0.0-preview2/src/Microsoft.Extensions.Testing.Abstractions/TestResult.cs)。

trans-unit.source: After all tests finish, the runner sends a TestRunner.Completed message to dotnet test, which `dotnet test` sends as TestExecution.Completed to the adapter.
trans-unit.target: 所有测试完成后，运行程序将向 dotnet test 发送 TestRunner.Completed 消息，`dotnet test` 再将该消息作为 TestExecution.Completed 发送到适配器。

trans-unit.source: Once the adapter is done, it sends `dotnet test` a TestSession.Terminate which will cause `dotnet test` to shutdown.
trans-unit.target: 适配器完成操作后，会向 `dotnet test` 发送 TestSession.Terminate，这将关闭 `dotnet test`。

trans-unit.source: Test discovery
trans-unit.target: 测试发现

trans-unit.source: Test discovery
trans-unit.target: 测试发现

trans-unit.source: After the optional version check, the adapter sends a TestDiscovery.Start message.
trans-unit.target: 可选版本检查后，适配器发送 TestDiscovery.Start 消息。

trans-unit.source: Because in this case, the adapter does not need to attach to the process, `dotnet test` will start the runner itself.
trans-unit.target: 因为在这种情况下，适配器并不需要附加到进程，`dotnet test` 将自己启动运行程序。

trans-unit.source: Also, since there is no long list of arguments to be passed to the runner, no --wait-command flag is needed to be passed to the runner.
trans-unit.target: 此外，由于没有要传递到运行程序的参数长列表，因此无需将 --wait-command 标志传递到运行程序。

trans-unit.source: `dotnet test` only passes a --list argument to the runner, which means the runner should not run the tests, just list them.
trans-unit.target: `dotnet test` 仅将 --list 参数传递到运行程序，这意味着运行程序不应运行测试，而应仅列出测试。

trans-unit.source: The runner then sends `dotnet test` (and it passes forward to the adapter) a TestDiscovery.TestFound for each [test](https://github.com/dotnet/cli/blob/rel/1.0.0-preview2/src/Microsoft.Extensions.Testing.Abstractions/Test.cs) found.
trans-unit.target: 然后，运行程序向 `dotnet test` 发送用于每个找到的[测试](https://github.com/dotnet/cli/blob/rel/1.0.0-preview2/src/Microsoft.Extensions.Testing.Abstractions/Test.cs)的 TestDiscovery.TestFound（dotnet test 再传递到适配器）。

trans-unit.source: After all tests are discovered, the runner sends a TestRunner.Completed message to dotnet test, which `dotnet test` sends as TestDiscovery.Completed to the adapter.
trans-unit.target: 发现所有测试后，运行程序将向 dotnet test 发送 TestRunner.Completed 消息，`dotnet test` 再将该消息作为 TestDiscovery.Completed 发送到适配器。

trans-unit.source: Once the adapter is done, it sends `dotnet test` a TestSession.Terminate which will cause `dotnet test` to shutdown.
trans-unit.target: 适配器完成操作后，会向 `dotnet test` 发送 TestSession.Terminate，这将关闭 `dotnet test`。
